product.name: UltraSound Pro Wireless Headphones
product.description: Premium noise-canceling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life and studio-quality sound

reviews.title: Amazing sound quality!
reviews.review_text: These headphones are absolutely incredible! The noise cancellation works perfectly during my daily commute, and the sound quality is crystal clear. Battery life easily lasts me through long flights. Much better than my old Sony headphones. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Disappointing build quality
reviews.review_text: Expected much better for the price. The headphones feel cheap and flimsy. After just 3 weeks, the left ear cup started crackling. Customer service was unhelpful. Should have bought Bose instead. The comfort and design are poor.

reviews.title: Great for work calls
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my remote work setup. The microphone quality is excellent and colleagues say I sound very clear. Comfortable for all-day wear. Only complaint is they're a bit heavy after 6+ hours. The connectivity and bass are solid.

reviews.title: Terrible experience
reviews.review_text: Worst purchase I've made this year. Constant connectivity issues with Bluetooth. Sound cuts out randomly. Tried multiple devices - same problem. Returning immediately. Save your money and buy Apple AirPods instead. The build quality is awful.

reviews.title: Perfect for music lovers
reviews.review_text: As a music producer, I'm very picky about audio quality. These headphones deliver exceptional clarity across all frequencies. The bass is punchy without being overwhelming. Worth every penny for serious listeners! The treble and sound quality are outstanding.

reviews.title: Decent but not exceptional
reviews.review_text: These are okay headphones for the price range. The noise cancellation works but not as well as advertised. Battery life is acceptable for daily use. The comfort could be better for long sessions. Average performance overall.

reviews.title: Excelente calidad de sonido
reviews.review_text: Estos auriculares son fantásticos. La calidad de sonido es excepcional y la cancelación de ruido funciona perfectamente. Los uso todos los días para trabajar desde casa. The design and build quality are premium. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Overpriced for what you get
reviews.review_text: For $300, I expected much more. The sound quality is mediocre compared to Sennheiser headphones in the same price range. Comfort is poor and they feel heavy. The microphone quality is disappointing for calls.

reviews.title: Good for gaming
reviews.review_text: These work great for gaming sessions. The bass response is excellent for FPS games and the comfort is good for 3-4 hour sessions. Battery life lasts through long gaming marathons. The connectivity is stable with my PC.

reviews.title: Defective product
reviews.review_text: Received a clearly defective unit. Right ear cup doesn't work at all. Tried contacting customer service multiple times with no response. Very disappointed with this company. The build quality seems cheap and unreliable.

reviews.title: Parfait pour les voyages
reviews.review_text: Ces écouteurs sont parfaits pour mes voyages d'affaires. La réduction de bruit est excellente dans l'avion. The battery life and sound quality exceed expectations. Much better than my old Beats headphones. Shipping to France was very fast.

reviews.title: Produto mediano
reviews.review_text: The headphones are okay but nothing special. Comfort is acceptable for short sessions but gets uncomfortable after 2 hours. The design looks nice but build quality feels average. Price is a bit high for what you get.

reviews.title: Gute Qualität
reviews.review_text: Very good headphones overall. The noise cancellation works well in my office environment. Sound quality is clear and the bass is well-balanced. Only issue is the microphone could be better for video calls. Shipping to Germany was quick.

reviews.title: Poor customer service
reviews.review_text: The headphones themselves are decent but had issues with the charging case. When I contacted customer service, they were very unhelpful and rude. For this price, I expected better support. The connectivity and comfort are below average.

reviews.title: 素晴らしい音質
reviews.review_text: Outstanding audio quality for both music and calls. The noise cancellation is perfect for Tokyo's busy trains. Battery life easily lasts my entire commute. The design is sleek and modern. Much better than Audio-Technica headphones I had before.

reviews.title: Complete waste of money
reviews.review_text: Absolutely terrible product. The sound quality is worse than $50 headphones. Constant static and crackling sounds. The build quality feels like cheap plastic. Customer service ignored my emails. Should have bought JBL instead.

reviews.title: Buona qualità audio
reviews.review_text: Good headphones for the price. The sound quality is clear and the bass response is excellent for electronic music. Comfort is good for 2-3 hour sessions. The connectivity is stable with my iPhone. Design looks premium and modern.

reviews.title: Mixed feelings
reviews.review_text: These headphones have good and bad points. The noise cancellation works well but the comfort is lacking for long use. Battery life is as advertised but charging is slow. The microphone quality is average for work calls.

reviews.title: Отличные наушники
reviews.review_text: Excellent headphones for professional use. The sound quality is crystal clear and perfect for my audio editing work. Noise cancellation blocks out all office distractions. The build quality feels premium and durable. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: No vale la pena
reviews.review_text: For the price, these headphones are disappointing. The comfort is poor and they hurt my ears after 1 hour. Sound quality is mediocre and the bass is too weak. The design looks cheap despite the high price. Not recommended.

reviews.title: Great for workouts
reviews.review_text: These headphones stay secure during my gym sessions. The sound quality motivates me through tough workouts. Sweat resistance seems good so far. Battery life gets me through multiple workout sessions. The bass and treble balance is perfect for hip-hop music.

reviews.title: Broke after one week
reviews.review_text: Unacceptable quality control. The headband cracked after just one week of normal use. For $300, this is completely unacceptable. Customer service offered no help. The build quality is terrible and feels like cheap plastic throughout.

reviews.title: Perfect for podcasts
reviews.review_text: Excellent clarity for podcast listening. The noise cancellation helps me focus during long commutes. Comfort is outstanding even for 4+ hour sessions. The microphone quality is great for taking calls. Much better than my old Sennheiser headphones.

reviews.title: Average performance
reviews.review_text: The headphones work as expected but nothing exceptional. Sound quality is decent for casual listening. The comfort is okay for short sessions but gets uncomfortable quickly. The design looks nice but build quality feels average for the price.

reviews.title: Bon rapport qualité-prix
reviews.review_text: Good value for money overall. The noise cancellation works well in busy cafés. Sound quality is clear and the bass response is satisfying. Battery life meets expectations. The connectivity with my MacBook is stable and reliable.

reviews.title: Uncomfortable design
reviews.review_text: The sound quality is okay but the comfort is terrible. They squeeze my head too tightly and cause headaches after 30 minutes. The ear cups are too small for my ears. For this price, the comfort should be much better.

reviews.title: Professional quality
reviews.review_text: As a sound engineer, I need accurate audio reproduction. These headphones deliver exceptional clarity across all frequencies. The build quality feels premium and durable. Perfect for both professional work and personal listening. The treble and sound quality are superb.

reviews.title: Schreckliche Erfahrung
reviews.review_text: Terrible experience with these headphones. The Bluetooth connection drops constantly and the sound has a weird echo. Customer service in Germany was completely unhelpful. The build quality feels cheap and flimsy. Complete waste of money.

reviews.title: Good for travel
reviews.review_text: Perfect companion for long flights. The noise cancellation blocks out engine noise effectively. Battery life lasted my entire 12-hour flight to Asia. Comfort is good for extended wear. The design is sleek and folds nicely for packing.

reviews.title: Prestazioni nella media
reviews.review_text: Average headphones for the price range. The sound quality is acceptable but not outstanding. Comfort is okay for 1-2 hour sessions. The microphone works fine for video calls. The connectivity is stable but nothing special compared to competitors.

reviews.title: 优秀的降噪效果
reviews.review_text: Excellent noise cancellation for my daily subway commute in Beijing. The sound quality is crystal clear and battery life exceeds expectations. Much better than my previous Beats headphones. The build quality feels premium and durable.

reviews.title: Плохое качество сборки
reviews.review_text: Poor build quality for the price. The plastic feels cheap and the headband started cracking after two weeks. Customer service was unhelpful when I contacted them. The comfort and design are disappointing. Not worth the money.

reviews.title: جودة صوت ممتازة
reviews.review_text: Great sound quality for music and calls. The noise cancellation works well in busy environments. Battery life is impressive and lasts all day. The connectivity with my Samsung phone is stable. Only issue is comfort during long sessions.

reviews.title: Fruktansvärt dålig kvalitet
reviews.review_text: Terrible quality control. The left ear cup stopped working after just 5 days. For this price, I expected much better reliability. Customer service took weeks to respond. The build quality feels flimsy and cheap throughout.

reviews.title: Perfeito para trabalho remoto
reviews.review_text: Perfect for remote work from home. The microphone quality is excellent for video conferences. Noise cancellation blocks out neighborhood sounds perfectly. Comfort is outstanding for 8+ hour work days. The sound quality and bass are superb.

reviews.title: Μέτρια ποιότητα
reviews.review_text: Average headphones for the price point. The sound quality is decent but not exceptional. Comfort is okay for short listening sessions. The design looks modern but build quality feels average. Better options available for this price range.

reviews.title: God til pendling
reviews.review_text: Great for my daily train commute. The noise cancellation effectively blocks out train sounds. Battery life easily lasts my round trip to work. Sound quality is clear and the bass response is good. The connectivity is reliable with my iPhone.

reviews.title: Zklamání za tyto peníze
reviews.review_text: Disappointing for this price range. The comfort is poor and causes ear fatigue quickly. Sound quality is mediocre compared to Audio-Technica headphones. The microphone quality is below average for calls. Not recommended for the price.

reviews.title: Excellent for studying
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my university studies. The noise cancellation helps me focus in the library. Sound quality is excellent for both music and educational videos. Battery life lasts through long study sessions. The design is sleek and professional looking.

reviews.title: Producto defectuoso
reviews.review_text: Received a clearly defective product. The right ear cup produces static noise constantly. Tried multiple devices with same issue. Customer service was slow to respond and unhelpful. The build quality seems unreliable and cheap.

reviews.title: ゲームに最適
reviews.review_text: Excellent for gaming sessions. The sound quality provides great spatial awareness in FPS games. Comfort is good for 3-4 hour gaming marathons. The microphone works well for team communication. Much better than my old JBL headphones for gaming.

reviews.title: Decent but overpriced
reviews.review_text: The headphones work fine but feel overpriced for what you get. Sound quality is acceptable for casual listening. The comfort is okay for short sessions but gets uncomfortable after an hour. The design looks nice but build quality is average.

reviews.title: Excellent pour la musique classique
reviews.review_text: Outstanding for classical music listening. The sound reproduction is incredibly accurate and detailed. The treble is crisp without being harsh. Perfect for my home listening setup. The build quality feels premium and the design is elegant.

reviews.title: Dårlig komfort
reviews.review_text: Poor comfort design. The headphones clamp too tightly and cause headaches after 30 minutes of use. Sound quality is decent but the comfort issues make them unusable for long sessions. The ear cups are too small for average-sized ears.

reviews.title: Calidad terrible
reviews.review_text: Terrible quality for the price. The Bluetooth connection is unstable and cuts out frequently. Sound quality is poor with distorted bass. Customer service was completely unhelpful. Should have bought Sony headphones instead. Complete waste of money.

reviews.title: Great for podcasts
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my daily podcast listening. The sound clarity makes voices very clear and easy to understand. Noise cancellation helps me focus during commutes. Battery life easily lasts through multiple podcast episodes. The connectivity is stable.

reviews.title: ممتاز للاستخدام المهني
reviews.review_text: Excellent for professional audio work. The frequency response is very flat and accurate. Perfect for my music production studio. The build quality feels solid and durable. Much better than my previous Sennheiser headphones for mixing work.

reviews.title: Средние наушники
reviews.review_text: Average headphones for the price range. The sound quality is acceptable but nothing special. Comfort is okay for 1-2 hour sessions. The microphone works fine for video calls but could be clearer. The design looks modern but feels plasticky.

reviews.title: Battery life disappointing
reviews.review_text: The advertised 30-hour battery life is completely false. I get maybe 15 hours with moderate use. Sound quality is okay but not great for the price. The comfort is poor and causes ear fatigue. Customer service was unhelpful about the battery issue.

reviews.title: Buoni per l'ufficio
reviews.review_text: Good for office use and video conferences. The noise cancellation blocks out office chatter effectively. Sound quality is clear for both music and calls. The microphone quality is excellent for meetings. The design is professional and sleek.

reviews.title: Verschrikkelijke kwaliteit
reviews.review_text: Terrible quality control. The headphones arrived with a loose connection in the left ear cup. Sound cuts in and out constantly. For €300, this is completely unacceptable. Customer service in Netherlands was slow and unhelpful. Returning immediately.

reviews.title: 完美的通勤伴侣
reviews.review_text: Perfect companion for my daily commute in Shanghai. The noise cancellation blocks out subway noise completely. Sound quality is exceptional for both music and audiobooks. Battery life easily lasts my entire day. The build quality feels premium.

reviews.title: Razoável pelo preço
reviews.review_text: Reasonable headphones for the price point. The sound quality is decent for casual listening. Comfort is acceptable for short sessions but gets uncomfortable after 2 hours. The connectivity is stable but nothing exceptional compared to competitors.

reviews.title: Bra för träning
reviews.review_text: Great for workout sessions at the gym. They stay secure during intense cardio and weight training. The sound quality motivates me through tough workouts. Sweat resistance seems good after several months of use. The bass response is excellent for electronic music.

reviews.title: Service client décevant
reviews.review_text: Disappointing customer service experience. The headphones developed a charging issue after 2 months. When I contacted support, they were unhelpful and rude. For this price, I expected much better after-sales support. The build quality feels cheap.

reviews.title: Doskonałe do pracy
reviews.review_text: Excellent for remote work from home. The noise cancellation blocks out street noise perfectly. Sound quality is crystal clear for video conferences. Comfort is outstanding for 8+ hour work days. Much better than my old Beats headphones for professional use.

reviews.title: 品質管理が悪い
reviews.review_text: Poor quality control from the manufacturer. The headphones arrived with scratches on the ear cups and loose screws. Sound quality is mediocre with distorted highs. Customer service in Japan was completely unhelpful. Not worth the high price.

reviews.title: Excelente para viajes
reviews.review_text: Excellent for long business trips. The noise cancellation works perfectly on airplanes. Battery life lasted my entire 15-hour flight to Asia. Comfort is good for extended wear. The design folds nicely and fits well in carry-on luggage.

reviews.title: Средно качество
reviews.review_text: Average quality headphones for this price range. The sound is decent but lacks the clarity of premium brands. Comfort is okay for 1-2 hour sessions. The microphone works fine for calls but could be clearer. The design looks modern but feels plasticky.

reviews.title: Overpriced for quality
reviews.review_text: Overpriced for the quality you receive. The sound is muddy and lacks detail compared to Audio-Technica headphones in the same price range. Comfort is poor with excessive clamping force. The build quality feels cheap despite the premium price tag.

reviews.title: Perfect for studying
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my medical school studies. The noise cancellation helps me focus in busy libraries and cafés. Sound quality is excellent for educational videos and lectures. Battery life lasts through long study sessions. The comfort is outstanding for extended use.

reviews.title: Katastrophale Qualität
reviews.review_text: Catastrophic build quality. The headband snapped after just 2 weeks of careful use. For €300, this is completely unacceptable. Customer service offered no replacement or refund. The materials feel cheap and flimsy throughout. Avoid this product.

reviews.title: 音楽制作に適している
reviews.review_text: Good for music production work. The frequency response is relatively flat and accurate. Perfect for mixing and mastering in my home studio. The build quality feels solid and professional. Only complaint is the comfort during very long sessions.

reviews.title: Calidad promedio
reviews.review_text: Average quality headphones for the price point. The sound is decent for casual listening but lacks the detail of premium brands. Comfort is acceptable for short sessions. The connectivity is stable but the microphone quality could be better.

reviews.title: مشاكل في الاتصال
reviews.review_text: Constant connectivity issues with Bluetooth. The connection drops frequently and requires re-pairing. Sound quality is mediocre when it works. For this price, the reliability should be much better. Customer service was unhelpful with troubleshooting.

reviews.title: Fantastiska för pendling
reviews.review_text: Fantastic for my daily train commute to work. The noise cancellation blocks out all the train noise perfectly. Sound quality is exceptional for both music and podcasts. Battery life easily lasts my entire workday. The design is sleek and professional.

reviews.title: Prodotto difettoso
reviews.review_text: Defective product right out of the box. The right ear cup produces crackling sounds at any volume level. Tried multiple devices with the same issue. Customer service in Italy was slow to respond and offered no solution. Complete waste of money.

reviews.title: Great for online classes
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my online university classes. The microphone quality is excellent and professors say I sound very clear. Noise cancellation helps me focus during lectures. Comfort is good for 3-4 hour class sessions. The connectivity is stable with my laptop.

reviews.title: Qualité correcte
reviews.review_text: Decent quality for the price range. The sound is acceptable for casual listening but nothing exceptional. Comfort is okay for 1-2 hour sessions but gets uncomfortable longer. The design looks modern but the build quality feels average.

reviews.title: Разочарование
reviews.review_text: Disappointing purchase for this price point. The sound quality is mediocre with weak bass response. Comfort is poor and causes headaches after 30 minutes. The build quality feels cheap and plasticky. Should have bought Sony headphones instead.

reviews.title: Excellent for podcasts
reviews.review_text: Outstanding for podcast listening during my daily walks. The sound clarity makes voices very crisp and easy to understand. Noise cancellation blocks out traffic noise effectively. Battery life lasts through multiple podcast episodes. The design is modern and stylish.

reviews.title: خدمة عملاء سيئة
reviews.review_text: Terrible customer service experience. The headphones stopped charging after 3 weeks. When I contacted support, they were rude and unhelpful. For this price, I expected much better quality and service. The build quality feels unreliable and cheap.

reviews.title: Bra för gaming
reviews.review_text: Great for gaming sessions with friends. The sound quality provides excellent spatial awareness in competitive games. Microphone quality is clear for team communication. Comfort is good for 4-5 hour gaming marathons. The connectivity is stable with my gaming PC.

reviews.title: Producto promedio
reviews.review_text: Average product for the price range. The sound quality is decent but not exceptional compared to competitors. Comfort is acceptable for short listening sessions. The microphone works fine for calls but could be clearer. The design looks nice but feels plasticky.

reviews.title: 期待外れ
reviews.review_text: Disappointing for the high price point. The sound quality lacks detail and clarity compared to Audio-Technica headphones. Comfort is poor with excessive pressure on the ears. The build quality feels cheap despite the premium pricing. Not recommended.

reviews.title: Відмінні навушники
reviews.review_text: Excellent headphones for professional audio work. The frequency response is very accurate and detailed. Perfect for my recording studio mixing work. The build quality feels premium and durable. Much better than my previous Sennheiser headphones for critical listening.

reviews.title: Qualité décevante
reviews.review_text: Disappointing quality for the price. The headphones developed a loose connection after just 2 weeks. Sound cuts in and out constantly. Customer service in Morocco was completely unhelpful. The build quality feels flimsy and unreliable throughout.

reviews.title: Good for travel
reviews.review_text: Good companion for business travel. The noise cancellation works well on flights and in hotels. Battery life lasted my entire week-long trip. Comfort is acceptable for extended wear. The design folds compactly and fits well in luggage.

reviews.title: Обычные наушники
reviews.review_text: Ordinary headphones for this price category. The sound quality is acceptable but nothing special. Comfort is okay for 1-2 hour sessions but gets uncomfortable longer. The connectivity is stable but the microphone quality could be much better.

reviews.title: Troppo caro per la qualità
reviews.review_text: Too expensive for the quality provided. The sound is muddy and lacks the clarity of premium brands like Bose. Comfort is poor with excessive clamping pressure. The build quality feels cheap despite the high price. Better alternatives available.

reviews.title: Tuyệt vời cho công việc
reviews.review_text: Excellent for remote work from home. The noise cancellation blocks out street noise perfectly in busy Ho Chi Minh City. Sound quality is crystal clear for video conferences. Comfort is outstanding for 8+ hour work days. The microphone quality is professional grade.

reviews.title: Poor build quality
reviews.review_text: Extremely poor build quality for the price. The ear cup padding started peeling off after just one month of use. The plastic feels cheap and flimsy throughout. Customer service was completely unhelpful when I reported the issue. Not worth the money.

reviews.title: Dobre do nauki
reviews.review_text: Good for studying and online classes. The noise cancellation helps me focus in my shared apartment. Sound quality is clear for educational videos and lectures. Comfort is acceptable for 3-4 hour study sessions. The connectivity with my laptop is stable.

reviews.title: متوسط الجودة
reviews.review_text: Average quality headphones for this price range. The sound is decent for casual listening but lacks detail. Comfort is okay for short sessions but gets uncomfortable after an hour. The design looks modern but the build quality feels average.

reviews.title: 音質が期待以下
reviews.review_text: Sound quality is below expectations for this price point. The bass is muddy and the highs are harsh. Comfort is poor with excessive clamping force on the head. The build quality feels cheap compared to JBL headphones in the same price range.

reviews.title: Perfekt för musikproduktion
reviews.review_text: Perfect for music production in my home studio. The frequency response is very flat and accurate for mixing work. The build quality feels professional and durable. Much better than my old Audio-Technica headphones for critical listening and mastering.

reviews.title: Produto com defeito
reviews.review_text: Defective product from day one. The left ear cup produces static noise at any volume level. Tried multiple devices with the same problem. Customer service in Brazil was slow and offered no real solution. Complete waste of money and time.

reviews.title: عالی برای مطالعه
reviews.review_text: Excellent for studying in busy university libraries. The noise cancellation blocks out distracting conversations effectively. Sound quality is clear for educational podcasts and videos. Battery life lasts through long study sessions. The design is sleek and professional.

reviews.title: Средние наушники
reviews.review_text: Average headphones for the price category. The sound quality is acceptable but not outstanding. Comfort is okay for 1-2 hour sessions but becomes uncomfortable longer. The microphone works fine for calls but could be much clearer.

reviews.title: Skuffende kvalitet
reviews.review_text: Disappointing quality for the high price. The sound lacks detail and clarity compared to Sennheiser headphones. Comfort is poor with too much pressure on the ears. The build quality feels cheap despite the premium pricing. Not recommended for this price.

reviews.title: बहुत अच्छा साउंड क्वालिटी
reviews.review_text: Excellent sound quality for both music and work calls. The noise cancellation works perfectly in busy Mumbai traffic. Battery life easily lasts my entire workday. Comfort is outstanding for long video conferences. Much better than my old Beats headphones.

reviews.title: Απαράδεκτη ποιότητα
reviews.review_text: Unacceptable quality for the price. The headphones broke after just 2 weeks of normal use. The plastic feels cheap and brittle. Customer service in Greece was completely unhelpful and rude. The build quality is terrible throughout. Avoid this product.

reviews.title: 适合日常使用
reviews.review_text: Good for daily commuting and office work. The noise cancellation blocks out subway noise effectively. Sound quality is clear for both music and calls. Comfort is acceptable for 3-4 hour sessions. The connectivity with my phone is stable and reliable.

reviews.title: Calidad aceptable
reviews.review_text: Acceptable quality for the price range. The sound is decent for casual listening but nothing exceptional. Comfort is okay for short sessions but gets uncomfortable after 2 hours. The design looks nice but the build quality feels average.

reviews.title: Fiyatına göre kötü
reviews.review_text: Poor value for the price point. The sound quality is mediocre with weak bass response. Comfort is terrible and causes headaches after 30 minutes. The build quality feels cheap and plasticky. Should have bought Sony headphones instead.

reviews.title: Отличные для работы
reviews.review_text: Excellent for remote work and video conferences. The microphone quality is professional grade and colleagues say I sound very clear. Noise cancellation blocks out home distractions perfectly. Comfort is outstanding for 8+ hour work days.

reviews.title: Qualidade terrível
reviews.review_text: Terrible quality control from the manufacturer. The headphones arrived with a cracked headband and loose screws. Sound quality is poor with distorted audio. Customer service in Portugal was slow and unhelpful. Complete waste of money.

reviews.title: ゲームに良い
reviews.review_text: Good for gaming and entertainment. The sound quality provides excellent spatial awareness in competitive games. Comfort is acceptable for 3-4 hour gaming sessions. The microphone works well for team communication. The connectivity is stable with my PlayStation.

reviews.title: جودة متوسطة
reviews.review_text: Average quality headphones for this price category. The sound is decent for casual listening but lacks detail. Comfort is okay for 1-2 hour sessions but gets uncomfortable longer. The design looks modern but the build quality feels average.

reviews.title: Inte värt pengarna
reviews.review_text: Not worth the money for this quality level. The sound is muddy and lacks clarity compared to Audio-Technica headphones. Comfort is poor with excessive pressure on the head. The build quality feels cheap despite the premium price tag. Disappointing purchase.
